==Descriptions==
{{Description|A small mountainside named “Smoke Ridge” by local tribesmen. It is said that these two names were given because subterranean magma streams from the Great Volcano of Tollan flow through it, often causing smoke to rise between the valleys.<br>The temperature here is too high even for the tribespeople who regularly deal with Phlogiston, but perhaps that's precisely why the reclusive and unusual Qucusaur has chosen to live there.|[[Expedition]] description}}
